panels.description:
- Total number of sessions established to database(s). 
- Number of database sessions that were terminated because connection to the client was lost.
- Number of database sessions that were terminated by fatal errors.
- Number of database sessions that were terminated by operator intervention.

targets.rawSql:
with sessions as (
  SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  (data->>'sessions')::int8 as sessions,
  lag((data->>'sessions')::int8) over w as lag_sessions,
  (data->>'sessions_abandoned')::int8 as sessions_abandoned,
  lag((data->>'sessions_abandoned')::int8) over w as lag_sessions_abandoned,
  (data->>'sessions_fatal')::int8 as sessions_fatal,
  lag((data->>'sessions_fatal')::int8) over w as lag_sessions_fatal,
  (data->>'sessions_killed')::int8 as sessions_killed,
  lag((data->>'sessions_killed')::int8) over w as lag_sessions_killed
from db_stats 
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
window w as (order by time)
)
select 
  time,
  sum(sessions)-sum(lag_sessions) as established,
  sum(sessions_abandoned)-sum(lag_sessions_abandoned) as abandoned,
  sum(sessions_fatal)-sum(lag_sessions_fatal) as fatal,
  sum(sessions_killed)-sum(lag_sessions_killed) as killed
from sessions 
group by time
order by 1

panels.title: Connections Overview

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'calls')::bigint as c, lag((data->>'calls')::bigint) over w as c_lag,
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
  from stat_statements_calls
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where c > c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'xact_commit')::bigint as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::bigint) over w as c_lag,
    (data->>'xact_rollback')::bigint as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::bigint) over w as r_lag,
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
  from db_stats
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where time > time_lag
  and (c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag) > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((tt - tt_lag) / (c - c_lag)) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'total_time')::numeric as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::numeric) over w as tt_lag,
    (data->>'calls')::bigint as c, lag((data->>'calls')::bigint) over w as c_lag,
    time, dbname
  from stat_statements
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname, (tag_data->>'queryid')::text order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt > tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'numbackends')::bigint) as " "
from db_stats
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'numbackends')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'longest_tx_seconds')::bigint) as " "
from backends
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'longest_tx_seconds')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'active')::bigint) as " "
from backends
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'active')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.description:
Based on pg_locks

ExclusiveLock, RowExclusiveLock, ShareRowExclusiveLock, AccessExclusiveLock, ShareUpdateExclusiveLock

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  sum((data->>'count')::bigint) as " "
from locks_mode
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (tag_data->>'lockmode')::text ~~ '%Exclusive%'
  and (data->>'count')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: Exclusive locks (count)

panels.description: waiting — backend is currently waiting on a lock

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'waiting')::numeric) as " "
from backends
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'waiting')::numeric > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: Waiting sessions

panels.description: xact_rollback - number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((r - r_lag)::numeric / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as " "
from (
  select
    (data->>'xact_rollback')::bigint as r,
    lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::bigint) over w as r_lag,
    time,
    lag(time) over w as time_lag,
    dbname
  from db_stats
  where dbname in ($dbname)
    and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where time > time_lag
  and (r - r_lag) >= 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: Rollbacks (TX error)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'idleintransaction')::bigint) as " "
from backends
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'idleintransaction')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg(((h - h_lag)::numeric / ((h - h_lag) + (r - r_lag)))) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'blks_hit')::bigint as h, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::bigint) over w as h_lag,
    (data->>'blks_read')::bigint as r, lag((data->>'blks_read')::bigint) over w as r_lag,
    time, dbname
  from db_stats
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where (h - h_lag) + (r - r_lag) > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.description: Amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database.

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((b - b_lag)::numeric / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'temp_bytes')::bigint as b, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::bigint) over w as b_lag,
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
  from db_stats
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where b > b_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: Temp bytes written (1s rate)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((l - l_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'xlog_location_b')::numeric as l, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::numeric) over w as l_lag,
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
  from wal
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where time > time_lag
  and l > l_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.description:
Time spent reading and writing data file blocks by backends in this database.

Based on pg_stat_database. Requires "track_io_timing=on"

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg(((r - r_lag) + (w - w_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as " "
from (
  select 
    (data->>'blk_read_time')::numeric as r, lag((data->>'blk_read_time')::numeric) over w as r_lag,
    (data->>'blk_write_time')::numeric as w, lag((data->>'blk_write_time')::numeric) over w as w_lag,
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
  from db_stats
  where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where time > time_lag
  and (r - r_lag) + (w - w_lag) > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: Database IO time (1s rate)

panels.description: archiver_pending_count - number of WAL files in the archive queue.

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'archiver_pending_count')::bigint) as " "
from archiver_pending_count
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'archiver_pending_count')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: WAL Archive (pending_count)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  tag_data->>'application_name'::text as client_info,
  avg((data->>'total_lag')::bigint) as " "
from replication
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
  and (data->>'total_lag')::bigint > 0
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->>'size_b')::bigint) as " "
from db_size
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.description:
1 = Primary - accepting writes.

2 = Secondary - read-only.

0 = No Replication - physical replication is not configured or there are no available standby servers.

targets.rawSql:
select distinct
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  last_value((data->>'in_recovery_int')::bigint) over w as " "
from postgres_role
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
order by 1

panels.title: PostgreSQL Role

targets.rawSql:
/* select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  last((data->>'datminmxid_age')::bigint, time) as " "
from datfrozenxid
where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1, 2
order by 1 */

SELECT
  time,
  dbname,
  last_datminmxid_age AS " "
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (dbname, time)
    dbname,
    $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
    (data->>'datminmxid_age')::bigint AS last_datminmxid_age
  FROM datfrozenxid
  WHERE dbname IN ($dbname)
    AND $__timeFilter(time)
  ORDER BY dbname, time DESC
) sub
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  "time",
  dbname,
  last_datfrozenxid_age as " "
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT ON (dbname, "time") dbname,
      $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
      (data ->> 'datfrozenxid_age') :: bigint AS last_datfrozenxid_age
    FROM
      datfrozenxid
    WHERE
      dbname IN ($dbname)
      AND $__timeFilter(time)
    ORDER BY
      dbname,
      time DESC
  ) sub
ORDER BY
  "time";

options.content: ## Brought to you by

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT dbname
FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics
WHERE '$replicas' = 'show' OR dbname NOT IN (
  SELECT dbname FROM (
    SELECT
      dbname,
      (data->>'in_recovery_int')::int AS in_recovery_int,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dbname ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn
    FROM postgres_role
    WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  ) sub
  WHERE rn = 1 AND in_recovery_int = 2
)
ORDER BY 1;
list.name: dbname
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT dbname
FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics
WHERE '$replicas' = 'show' OR dbname NOT IN (
  SELECT dbname FROM (
    SELECT
      dbname,
      (data->>'in_recovery_int')::int AS in_recovery_int,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dbname ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn
    FROM postgres_role
    WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  ) sub
  WHERE rn = 1 AND in_recovery_int = 2
)
ORDER BY 1;

list.description: option to show or to hide replicas databases
list.name: replicas
